response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. We are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $8,500. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique chance to own something truly remarkable without breaking the bank. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 8500}
